Sir, what do you mean by HDRip? Sa HDTV ba ang source mo? Or Bluray? Awesome quality by the way. Is there a chance na gumawa ka ng 720p na quality? Ibang klase talaga mga rips mo idol.

@makcoy: my source is 720p HDRip from my buddy & fellow encoder, akosipalos. Siguro kung magkakaron ng blu-ray tagalog movies, maaring mag-encode ako ng 720p encodes. Pero sa ngayon puro DVD lang ang source ko kaya no way na i-upscale ko ang resolution to 720p without compromising the quality.
..and also i had a very low upload speed which take a very long time to transfer a large file to the seedbox..
